poster_comment.text: And I thought the decoration back home was bad.

intro.text: Hi, hello, good evening. Um. Nice to see you… again.
Well you know how it is with upper management, occult-oriented management strategies only go so far and well…
the VP is possessed and there’s demons everywhere. Pretty sure the photocopier is possessed too...
... And you expect me to fix this?
Summoning me to correct your mistakes is an terrible waste of a ritual but very well.
Why am I the size of an imp?
Oh, well... I wasn’t able to get any blood or a live chicken to summon you, so I figured sharpies and a roast chicken would be good enough!
… You summoned me with a roast chicken?
I'm going to need more power to do what you're asking of me. This leaves you with two options...
One, I take your soul, or two, I take some of your life essence.

intro2.text: Hmm, I’ll have to make do with this for now.
Are there other people in the building? And which way do I... Oh.
...Right. Should've asked before I fucked her into a coma.

statues.text: Looks like these statues work like wards.
I'll have to start at the far end and work my way backward.

outtro.text: Well that should do it. With that ritual being so weak I think I'll stay a while longer.
